Italy.name: Pizza Margherita
Italy.description: Classic Neapolitan pizza with simple, fresh ingredients.
instructions: Preheat oven to highest temperature with pizza stone
Roll out dough thinly
Spread tomato sauce, add torn mozzarella
Bake for 60-90 seconds until crust is puffed
Add fresh basil leaves and drizzle with olive oil

Italy.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Italy.description: Creamy Roman pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
instructions: Cook pasta al dente
Fry pancetta until crispy
Whisk eggs with grated cheese and pepper
Combine hot pasta with pancetta, then mix in egg mixture
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper

Italy.name: Tiramisu
Italy.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers.
instructions: Brew strong coffee and let cool
Make zabaglione with egg yolks and sugar
Mix with mascarpone
Dip ladyfingers briefly in coffee
Layer with cream mixture
Dust with cocoa and chill 4+ hours

Japan.name: Sushi
Japan.description: Vinegared rice combined with various ingredients, primarily seafood.
instructions: Prepare sushi rice with vinegar mixture
Slice fish into thin pieces
For nigiri: form rice balls and top with fish
For maki: spread rice on nori, add fillings, and roll
Serve with wasabi and soy sauce

Japan.name: Ramen
Japan.description: Japanese noodle soup with rich broth and various toppings.
instructions: Simmer bones for broth (6+ hours)
Cook noodles separately
Season broth with soy sauce or miso
Assemble bowl with noodles, broth, and toppings
Add soft-boiled egg and nori last

Mexico.name: Tacos al Pastor
Mexico.description: Marinated pork tacos with pineapple, a Mexican adaptation of shawarma.
instructions: Blend chilies, achiote, and pineapple juice for marinade
Marinate pork for 4+ hours
Grill or roast pork on vertical spit if possible
Slice thinly and serve on tortillas
Top with onions, cilantro, and pineapple

Mexico.name: Mole Poblano
Mexico.description: Complex sauce with chocolate and chilies, served with chicken.
instructions: Toast and rehydrate chilies
Blend with other ingredients to make sauce
Simmer sauce for 1-2 hours
Cook chicken separately
Serve chicken smothered in mole with rice and tortillas
